title: Tarragon Property Services Chooses ResidentShield Protection Plan to Minimize Risk
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 6:20 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Yardi 
SANTA BARBARA, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Yardi announced today that Sumner, Washington-based Tarragon Property Services has added ResidentShield® Protection Plan ™ to its Yardi Voyager ® cloud-hosted property management and accounting platform to implement a required renters insurance program at their properties and improve compliance reporting for their multifamily communities. 
Following a few resident-caused losses including kitchen fires and damage to sprinklers struck by resident vehicles, Tarragon decided to adopt a required renters insurance program to mitigate ongoing property risk. They chose ResidentShield because it seamlessly integrates with their core Yardi Voyager system and provides program compliance reporting at the property level. It also offers two convenient coverage options for residents, including a default option that Tarragon automatically applies. 
According to Shelly Gil, multifamily regional manager for Tarragon, “ResidentShield has been an amazing addition to our Yardi Voyager system. It is easy to use and provides our residents with a very simple sign up process. We love that it seamlessly integrates with Voyager, and with the touch of a button, we can pull reports to confirm that our properties are fully covered.” 
ResidentShield also enables Tarragon to eliminate time-consuming application processing for their staff — which saves time and money. Tarragon provides iPad® tablets in their onsite rental offices so that prospective residents can easily apply online for a rental unit and purchase renters insurance at the same time. In addition, the program includes convenient marketing materials for their staff and rental offices to help promote ResidentShield. 
Gil continued, “With ResidentShield, we have greatly limited our out-of-pocket risk by requiring our residents to carry renters insurance. As a result, we have achieved 100% coverage and compliance at all of our properties, for all our residents, across our portfolio.” 
“We are delighted that Tarragon Property Services is protecting its properties with ResidentShield as part of their Yardi single-stack business solution. And, residents are receiving proven coverage that gives them peace of mind and increases their satisfaction,” said Terri Dowen, senior vice president of sales for Yardi. 
About Tarragon Property Services 
Based in Sumner, Wash., Tarragon Property Services, an Investco Company, performs commercial and residential property management services for the real estate investments owned and managed by Investco Financial Corporation. Tarragon Property Services manages over 2,800 multifamily units as well as over 4.6 million square feet of industrial, retail and office projects. For more information, visit www.tarragon.com . 
About Yardi 
Now in its fourth decade, Yardi® is committed to the design, development and support of software for real estate investment management and property management. With the Yardi Multifamily Suite™, Yardi Commercial Suite™, Yardi Investment Suite™ and Yardi Orion™ Business Intelligence, the Yardi Voyager® platform is a complete real estate management solution. It includes operations, accounting and ancillary processes and services with portfolio-wide business intelligence and platform-wide mobility. Yardi is based in Santa Barbara, Calif., and serves clients worldwide from offices in North America, Asia, Australia, Europe and the Middle East. For more information, visit www.yardi.com .
